extendedInfo.description: Ranked as the #1 Amazon Kindle subscription blog since 2010: come join the interactive blog community from the author of the best-selling Kindle book âFree Kindle Books and How to Find Them,â where you will receive tips on how to maximize your Kindle experience, author interviews, articles from the authorâs take on the eBook world, and links to special and discounted Kindle books, and the heads-up on the numerous books, short stories, and more available for you to read on your Kindle for no charge from numerous sites in addition to Amazon. Over 125,000 people get their daily fix from the blog â why not try out this FREE app today?!?Kindle Fire owners have been frustrated with not being able to receive blogs on the Kindle Fire as they can with their other Kindle devices. With this app, the problem is solved as it is optimized for your Kindle Fire as well as other Android-based tablets and phones.Michael Gallagher is the author of several bestselling Kindle how-to guides, and his title "Free Kindle Books and How to Find Them" has been the #1 Kindle reference guide for over two years, garnering #53 and #72 on the Top 100 Kindle bestseller lists in 2010 and 2011, respectively.

reviews.title: Misrepresentation
reviews.comment: None of these books are free.  There are lots of other sites out there that offer truly free kindle books. Where are the TIPS the title eludes to? Shame on you!
reviews.author: Stacy Barbier

reviews.title: No longer my go-to
reviews.comment: For me, this is much  easier to use than the site on the phone. Just check it a couple of times a day and it\'s amazing the quality of books you\'ll find.  EDIT : This used to be my favorite place to find kindle books. Now only 1 or 2 selections are free. Will change my rating when the offerings go back to the way they were.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use to be better
reviews.comment: Rarely much mention of any free books. Use to be great and not helpful. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Bruce Youngren

reviews.title: Not true?
reviews.comment: Don\'t get it? The 99c special  for the book, does not work for me? Lowest is 2.99 US
reviews.author: Richard J

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Tommy Woods

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great relevant content!
reviews.author: Leila Antoniazzi

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I love this app.. it had really great book suggestions!
reviews.author: Patience Gray

reviews.title: I\'m in love
reviews.comment: With this app. Make sure to sub to his blog.
reviews.author: Sam Mungin

reviews.title: Used to be really good
reviews.comment: This app used to be really good and list lots of free books. Recently its been only listing books that have been marked down. Please make it like how it was before so I can change my rating to a 5.
reviews.author: Kelcie Takayama

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: It does what it says I got a lot of free books
reviews.author: Ruben Santiago

reviews.comment: Not working in samsung galaxy pop.
reviews.author: ganesan ram

reviews.comment: Rarely free books
reviews.author: Peter Apps

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: For your time and patience :) I appreciate you. Great app. I love the selection of free books. Job well done :)
reviews.author: Nelly Nellz

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: The app is fine. The author of the blog stated months ago that amazon put restrictions on him about how many free books he could post. I read it when he wrote it and understand completely.
reviews.author: Kenneth Peter

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: The daily free books are great. With so many books out there, this was a great place to start once I got my kindle fire. I really appreciate the time Michael (the blog\'s owner) puts into it. Kudos to him.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app for the avid reader
reviews.comment: A fantastic resource for any one who reads a lot. The amount of work which goes into this daily is astonishing, hats off to the developer. Am a member for only a few days and have already found six free books in the genre I like (all genres get a mention including non-fiction and lifestyle.)A great way to save both time ( no more trawling kindle site for the freebies) and cash for anyone who reads a lot
reviews.author: Lisa Bradley

reviews.title: Cant get books
reviews.comment: Asks me to sign up to amazon then when i completed it they wouldnt give me the book as im in uk.so i go to uk site it then tells me i dont have device. I have android phone samung galaxy. It should tell u at start if my phone is not suitable. Not 1/2 hour later.  Thanks for wasting my time.
reviews.author: jane Louis

reviews.title: Recommended for all Kindle users
reviews.comment: I check this app every day and almost always find at least one book to download. I\'m so glad Michael\'s blog is now an app. Especially since I use Kindle for Android as well.I\'ve told all my family and friends about it too.
reviews.author: Nicole Brown

reviews.title: Love and appreciate all the daily information!
reviews.comment: I appreciate all the work you put into this app and have found many different books to read based on your sharing the information daily
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Free Kindle Books and Tips
reviews.comment: Great, I think, except you can only get free books if you\'re from the UK or USA! I\'m from South Africa. What can I do? Help!
reviews.author: A Google User
